resources.string: Something went wrong while trying to contact Windows Azure AD Rights Management. If the problem continues, contact your administrator.
There was a problem signing you in. Check your internet connection, and try again.
Your device isn\'t allowed to use Windows Azure AD Rights Management. Contact your administrator for more info.
Sorry, you don\'t have permission to create new protected content for this organization. Try signing in as a different user, or contacting your administrator for additional permissions.
You don\'t have the permissions to view this content. Contact %s to request permissions.
You don\'t have the permissions to view this content. Visit %s to request permissions.
You can\'t view this content because the time limit has ended. Contact %s or your administrator to renew this content.
You can\'t view this content because the time limit has ended. Visit %s or contact your administrator to renew this content.
The RMS software used by this application needs to be updated. Contact technical support for this application, or your administrator, to request an update.
The application using Windows Azure AD Rights Management did something unexpected. Contact technical support for this application.
The application using Windows Azure AD Rights Management did something unexpected. Contact technical support for this application.
Something went wrong while trying to contact Windows Azure AD Rights Management. If the problem continues, contact your administrator.
Windows Azure AD Rights Management is not enabled for your organization. Contact your administrator for further details.
Your local AD RMS server doesn\'t support your device, so this content can\'t be decrypted. Contact your administrator for more info.
DNS lookup failed due to errors in DNS server setup. If the problem continues, contact your administrator.

There is a problem with the service\'s security certificate, which may indicate an attempt to fool you or intercept any data you send to the server. If the problem continues, contact your administrator.
You can\'t view this content without internet connection. Please check your connection before trying again and that your app is not working in offline mode.
Windows Azure AD Rights Management SDK Error
